dict.string: Only open selected Safari in Firefox
Open url or tab in alternative browser

on alfred_script(q) set AppleScript's text item delimiters to "||" set qitems to text items of q set AppleScript's text item delimiters to {""}
tell application "Safari" to close tab (item 4 of qitems as integer) of window (item 3 of qitems as integer)
tell application "opera" open location (item 1 of qitems) delay 1 activate end tell
return item 2 of qitems end alfred_script

try
# get the workflow's source folder set workflowFolder to (do shell script "pwd")
# load the Workflow library set wlib to load script POSIX file (workflowFolder & "/q_workflow.scpt")
# create a new Workflow Class set wf to wlib's new_workflow()
# start parsing the argument set q to wf's q_trim("{query}")
#if no argument, show the initial feedback if length of q = 0 then tell application "Safari" set currentIndex to 0 set t to current tab of window 1 if URL of t is not "topsites://" and URL of t is not "" then set tabURL to URL of t & "" set tabName to name of t set windowIndex to 1 set tabIndex to index of t set currentIndex to index of t
add_result of wf with isValid given theUid: "1||current", theArg: "" & tabURL & "||" & tabName & "||" & windowIndex & "||" & tabIndex, theTitle: tabName, theSubtitle: tabURL, theIcon:"", theAutocomplete:"", theType:"" end if
repeat with w in every window if visible of w and name of w is not "" then repeat with t in every tab in w if URL of t is not "topsites://" and URL of t is not "" and (index of w is not 1 or index of t is not currentIndex) then set tabURL to URL of t & "" set tabName to name of t set windowIndex to index of w set tabIndex to index of t
add_result of wf with isValid given theUid: windowIndex & "||" & tabIndex, theArg: "" & tabURL & "||" & tabName & "||" & windowIndex & "||" & tabIndex, theTitle: tabName, theSubtitle: tabURL, theIcon:"", theAutocomplete:"", theType:"" end if end repeat end if end repeat end tell else tell application "Safari" repeat with w in every window if visible of w and name of w is not "" then repeat with t in every tab in w if URL of t is not "topsites://" and URL of t is not "" and name of t contains q then set tabURL to URL of t set tabName to name of t set windowIndex to index of w set tabIndex to index of t
add_result of wf with isValid given theUid: windowIndex & "||" & tabIndex, theArg: "" & tabURL & "||" & tabName & "||" & windowIndex & "||" & tabIndex, theTitle: tabName, theSubtitle: tabURL, theIcon:"", theAutocomplete:"", theType:"" end if end repeat end if end repeat end tell end if
# show the feedback results return wf's to_xml("")
on error msg # in case of an error, send a Notification to MacOS wlib's q_send_notification("ERROR", msg, "") end try
Cerrar pestaña en Safari y abrirla en Opera
Abrir pestaña de safari en Opera

on alfred_script(q) set tabURL to "" set tabName to ""
tell application "Safari" set t to current tab of window 1 if URL of t is not "topsites://" and URL of t is not "" then set tabURL to URL of t & "" set tabName to name of t & "" close current tab of window 1 end if end tell
if tabURL is not "" then tell application "Opera" open location tabURL delay 1 activate end tell end if
return tabName end alfred_script

on alfred_script(q) tell application "Opera" open location q delay 1 activate end tell
return q end alfred_script
